org.skife.jdbi.v2.tweak

Interface TransactionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CMTTransactionHandler, DelegatingTransactionHandler, LocalTransactionHandler, SerializableTransactionRunner

    public interface TransactionHandler
    Interface which defines callbacks to be used when transaction methods are called on a handle. Used by specifying on an IDBI instance. All Handle instances opened from that IDBI will use the handler specified.

    The default implementation, ConnectionTransactionHandler, explicitely manages the transactions on the underlying JDBC Connection.

      • checkpoint

        void checkpoint(Handle handle,
                String name)
        Create a new checkpoint (savepoint in JDBC terminology)
        Parameters:
        handle - the handle on which the transaction is being checkpointed
        name - The name of the chckpoint, used to rollback to or release late

        Roll back to a named checkpoint
